quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Joss Stone and Clara
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, awards, march. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: When Joss Stone was 14, she auditioned for this television talent show singing Aretha Franklins You Make Me Feel Like A Natural Woman and Whitney Hustons Its Not Right but Its Okay.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Star for a Night

questions.question: In the The Light in the Piazza song Say It Somehow, Clara proposes to Fabrizio and he says  ...It is mine to ask and then he proposes to her.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Released in 2003 by Relentless Records, this was the first studio album by Joss Stone.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Soul Sessions

questions.question: In December 2007, Joss Stone performed live with this country singer on the television show CMT Crossroads.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: LeeAnn Rimes

questions.question: In the song Aiutami from the musical The Light in the Piazza, this character says Aiutami means help me in Italian. I dont speak any English, but I have to tell you whats going on.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Singora Naccarelli

questions.question: In 2009 Joss Stone made her television acting debut in the third season of these series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Tudors

questions.question: On 26 March 2009 Joss Stone appeared on American Idol and performed a duet with this Motown artist.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Smokey Robinson

questions.question: Is there any singing in Italian in The Light in the Piazza?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Which of these Grammy Awards did Joss Stone win in 2007?

options.text: Best RB Performance by a Duo or Group with Vocals

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Best RB Performance by a Duo or Group with Vocals

questions.question: In 2005 Joss Stone sang What Ever Happened to the Heroes, which was written by Pink, Billy Mann, and Christopher Rojas. It was from the soundtrack to this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fantastic Four

questions.question: According to Margaret Johnson, in The Light in the Piazza, Clara became an adult with the mind of a twelve-year-old at her 12th birthday, when she was kicked on the head by what animal?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A pony

questions.question: Joss Stone was nominated in this category at the British Awards in 2005.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: all of these

questions.question: What is the name of the song in the musical The Light in the Piazza during which Clara becomes lost and goes crazy, until Margaret finds her and takes her to the hotel room?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hysteria

questions.question: In the musical The Light in the Piazza, this item flies away from Clara during the first song, Statues and Stories. Fabrizio catches it and returns it to Clara which starts the soon-to-be love.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Her hat

questions.question: This is the first Italian city Clara and Margaret visit in the musical The Light in the Piazza. Here they meet Fabrizio and Clara falls in love.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Firenze

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Song and Best Original Song
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, vocalist, light. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The following lyrics are from a song by Finnish band Nightwish, included in the 2004 album Once:

options.text: ing me home or leave me be

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ghost Love Score

questions.question: Tarja Turunen, a former lead singer of the power metal band Nightwish, was born in what year?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1977

questions.question: Name he winner of the Academy Award for Best Original Song for 1983.

options.text: The Way He Makes Me Feel from Yentl
Papa, Can You Hear Me? from Yentl
Flashdance... What a Feeling from Flashdance

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Flashdance... What a Feeling from Flashdance

questions.question: This song won the Oscar for Best Original Song for 1988.

options.text: Let the River Run from Working Girl

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Let the River Run from Working Girl

questions.question: What is the final song of the musical The Light in the Piazza?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fable

questions.question: What song won the Academy Award for Best Original Song for 1984?

options.text: I Just Called to Say I Love You from The Woman in Red
Against All Odds (Take a Look at Me Now) from Against All Odds

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: I Just Called to Say I Love You from The Woman in Red

questions.question: What song received the Academy Award for Best Original Song at the 55th ceremony in 1983?

options.text: Eye of the Tiger from Rocky III
How Do You Keep the Music Playing? from Best Friends
It Might Be You from Tootsie
Up Where We Belong from An Officer and a Gentleman

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Up Where We Belong from An Officer and a Gentleman

questions.question: Which of these nominees won the Academy Award for Best Original Song for 1981?

options.text: For Your Eyes Only from For Your Eyes Only
Arthurs Theme (Best That You Can Do) from Arthur
The First Time It Happens from The Great Muppet Caper

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arthurs Theme (Best That You Can Do) from Arthur

questions.question: Is it true that at the end of the musical The Light in the Piazza, Clara returns home with her mother, Margaret and they live happily-ever-after with Claras father and Margarets husband Roy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: Name the winner the Academy Award for Best Original Song for 1985.

options.text: The Power of Love from Back to the Future
Miss Celies Blues (Sister) from The Color Purple
Say You, Say Me from White Nights

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Say You, Say Me from White Nights

questions.question: Tapio Wilska, famous as the main vocalist of the heavy metal band Sethian, sings the male vocals of which song, recorded by Nightwish?

options.text: Over the Hills and Far Away

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Pharaoh Sails to Orion

questions.question: Complete these lyrics from the song Wishmaster, featured in the third album of Finnish group, Nightwish:

options.text: The star shining only in him

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: One known only by him

questions.question: What song received the Oscar for Best Original Song at the 62nd ceremony in 1990?

options.text: The Girl Who Used To Be Me from Shirley Valentine
Under the Sea from The Little Mermaid
Kiss the Girl from The Little Mermaid

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Under the Sea from The Little Mermaid

questions.question: This song won in the category Best Original Song at the 59th Academy Awards ceremony in 1987.

options.text: Glory of Love from The Karate Kid, Part II
Somewhere Out There from An American Tail
Take My Breath Away from Top Gun
Life in a Looking Glass from Thats Life!

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Take My Breath Away from Top Gun

questions.question: Name the winner of the Academy Award for Best Original Song for 1987.

options.text: Nothings Gonna Stop Us Now from Mannequin
(Ive Had) The Time of My Life from Dirty Dancing
Shakedown from Beverly Hills Cop II

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: (Ive Had) The Time of My Life from Dirty Dancing

She dropped out of high school
She wasnt a very good student
